mg.mapviewer.util

Class PointModelUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • mg.mapviewer.util.PointModelUtil

  • public class PointModelUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Utilities for PointModel. Especially
    • provide a "close" threshold
    • calculate distence between two PointModel objects
    • find an approach of a point towards a line
    • compare point models

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected static int closeThreshold 
      static double EQUATORIAL_RADIUS
      The equatorial radius as defined by the WGS84 ellipsoid.

    • Field Detail

      • closeThreshold

        protected static int closeThreshold

      • EQUATORIAL_RADIUS

        public static final double EQUATORIAL_RADIUS
        The equatorial radius as defined by the WGS84 ellipsoid. WGS84 is the reference coordinate system used by the Global Positioning System.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • findApproach

        public static boolean findApproach(PointModel pm,
                                   PointModel segmentEnd1,
                                   PointModel segmentEnd2,
                                   WriteablePointModel pmResult)
        Check, whether pm has an approach to the segment segmentEnd1-segmentEnd2. Return the closest point in pmResult. Be careful with passing references to pmResult !!

      • longitudeDistance

        public static double longitudeDistance(double meters,
                                       double latitude)
        Calculates the amount of degrees of longitude for a given distance in meters.
        Parameters:
        meters - distance in meters
        latitude - the latitude at which the calculation should be performed
        Returns:
        longitude degrees
